name: Apex Armor Swap Trainer
description:
We are pleased to present a unique opportunity to train Armor Swap mechanic from the game Apex Legends!


The game contains the ability to adjust the Field of View and Mouse Sensitivity, perfectly replicating the original game settings.


You will have several game modes:
  • Free Mode - an open world filled with death boxes and obstacles. Train your armor swap the way you want!
  • 360 Mode - death boxes appear around you. you need to react as fast as possible, flick the mouse and swap the armor!
  • Aim Mode - definitely not inspired by Aim Lab. Shoot spheres and break records!

We will also be glad to hear your feedback and are ready to add new game mechanics.

Get this game started!
